# FeatureOriginalType

`````{py:module} howso.openapi.models
:noindex:

````{py:class} FeatureOriginalType

Original data type details. Used by clients to determine how to serialize and deserialize feature data.

```{py:attribute} data_type
:type: str

The name of the data type.
```

```{py:attribute} length
:type: Optional[int]

The maximum allowed length of the string.
```

```{py:attribute} encoding
:type: Optional[str]

The string encoding type.
```

```{py:attribute} format
:type: Optional[str]

The format of the number.
```

```{py:attribute} size
:type: Optional[int]

The size of the integer (in bytes).
```

```{py:attribute} unsigned
:type: Optional[bool]

If the integer is unsigned.
```

```{py:attribute} timezone
:type: Optional[str]

The standardized timezone name.
```

```{py:attribute} unit
:type: Optional[str]

The unit of the time delta.
```

````
`````
